lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, Dec. 31 -- Under the headline "German Crisis on the Eastern Front" the military expert of the newspaper Dagens Nyheter draws an unusually pessimistic picture of the German position. This pessimism impregnates all Swedish comment on the German situation at home and in the field.
abstract: Vichy and Stockholm speculation on German crisis

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
